alert.note: Alert for Cobb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:44AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Allatoona Creek at Stilesboro Road near Acworth affecting Cobb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Allatoona Creek at Stilesboro Road near Acworth. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields near the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Stilesboro Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM EST Tuesday was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.8 feet on 05/03/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM EST.
